item.title: Vitiligo in Children Linked to Higher Hearing Loss
item.description: Pediatric vitiligo is associated with higher risks for sensorineural and mixed hearing loss but not with most ocular conditions. Medscape Medical News

item.title: NICE Recommends Earlier Treatments for Chronic Heart Failure
item.description: Thousands of patients in England with early-stage heart failure could access effective drugs sooner under new draft guidance from NICE. Medscape News ...
